DOC.brief_summary: The goal propose research project ass safety ( dose limit toxicity , DLT ) combination pembrolizumab high-dose stereotactic body radiotherapy ( SBRT ) patient metastatic urothelial cancer . Both SBRT dose pembrolizumab dose fix , time combination vary . Secondary objective include response rate , local control , progression-free survival ( PFS ) overall survival ( OS ) . Exploratory endpoint include immunologic response response rate PD-L1- TIL- tumor . The combination sequence promising response rate best safety profile select continue Phase II trial .
DOC.brief_title: Trial Stereotactic Body Radiotherapy With Concurrent Pembrolizumab Metastatic Urothelial Cancer
